effect.Name: Multiplication With Sinus
effect.description: Multiplication With Sinus - Shader multiplies colors of objects and backgrounds with each other then colors are calculated by sinus
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Multiplication With Sinus (Background) Shader | 1.1 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: Shader multiplies colors of objects and backgrounds with each other then colors are calculated by sinus

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of background visibility
